history.proof: intros a b p q HltT. hauto lq: on use: pluspf_is_plusP, plusP_inv2.

ctx: intros a b p q HltT.
exceptions.exn: In environment A : Set A0, A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA, multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) a, b : Term A n p, q : list (Term A n) HltT : ltT (A:=A) ltM a b Unable to unify "eqP A eqA n (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) ?M1846 (pluspf (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) ?M1845 ?M1847) ?M1848)) (pluspf (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) ?M1845 ?M1847) (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) ?M1846 ?M1848))" with "pX (A:=A) (n:=n) b (projsig1 (list (Term A n)) (fun a0 : list (Term A n) => plusP (fst (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a p, q)) (snd (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a p, q)) a0) (plusp (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a p, q))) = pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a (pluspf p (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) b q))".

ctx: intros a b p q HltT.
exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

original: intros a b p q HltT. unfold pluspf. rewrite plusP_inv1 with (a:=a) (b:=b) (p:=p) (q:=q). - apply pluspf_inv2. auto. - auto.
